name: CNR Performance
author: Amit Moreno

sections.description:
Boost your WordPress performance with additional performance settings.

Installation

=

Upload the zip file to your wp-content/plugins folder, activate the plugin and go to the plugin settings page to start your settings (Settings > CNR Performance).
sections.changelog:
0.0.1

  • Release Date – 7th July, 2016 *

First realese with the following:

  • Remove WordPress generator meta tag
  • Remove version parameter from scripts & styles
  • Remove the support of RSS from the head
  • Remove the support of RSD from the head
  • Remove the xml file to support Windows Live Writer
  • Disable WordPress toolbar from the front-end
  • Disable Emoji Support
  • Disable Heartbeat API
  • Reduce Heartbeat API
  • Compress html output
  • Display compression comment
  • Preserve .htaccess cache

short_description: Boost your WordPress performance with additional performance settings.
description:
Boost your WordPress performance with additional performance settings.

Installation

=

Upload the zip file to your wp-content/plugins folder, activate the plugin and go to the plugin settings page to start your settings (Settings > CNR Performance).
